verses.name: Judges 16:20
verses.text: And she said, The Philistines be upon thee, Samson. And he awoke out of his sleep, and said, I will go out as at other times before, and shake myself. And he wist not that the Lord was departed from him.

verses.name: Judges 16:21
verses.text: But the Philistines took him, and put out his eyes, and brought him down to Gaza, and bound him with fetters of brass; and he did grind in the prison house.

verses.name: Judges 16:22
verses.text: Howbeit the hair of his head began to grow again after he was shaven.
